NOHO.HE.summary: NoHo Partners Oyj, together with its subsidiaries, engages in production and provision of restaurant services and labour hire services in Finland and Denmark. The company operates in two segments, Restaurants and Labour hire. It operated approximately 250 food restaurants, nightclubs and entertainment, fast casual restaurants, and international restaurants in Finland, Denmark, and Norway. The company also offers labour hire services for the hotel, restaurant and catering, events and promotions, construction and industry, logistics and maintenance, doctor services, and direct recruitment service sectors. Its restaurant concepts includes Elite, Savoy, Teatteri, Yes Yes Yes, Viihdemaailma Ilona, Stefan's Steakhouse, Palace, LÃ¶yly, Hanko Sushi, and Cock's & Cows. The company was formerly known as Restamax Oyj and changed its name to NoHo Partners Oyj in December 2018. NoHo Partners Oyj was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tampere, Finland.
